title: Enjoy The Advantage of Luxury With Cotswold Holiday Cottages (P Reeves)
text: By P Reeves Oct 22, 2015 The level of relaxation and recuperation can be increased if the choice of holiday location is a holiday resort surrounded by water. The luxury Cotswold holiday cottages fit this description as they are established right in the middle of lush green countryside filled with 140 plus quarry lakes teeming with wildlife.The holiday cottages are equipped with the most modern amenities, and the state of the art kitchen allows residents to cook their favourite dinner before they retire for the night or head out to enjoy further entertainment. All cottages are lake facing, making it a beautiful experience for the occupants and the setting is perfect for people fond of fishing in still waters. With so much greenery around and lakes filled with wildlife, the Cotswold water park is an ideal place for a spot of bird and animal watching.The water park is close to the capital of England as one can easily reach by road within 90 minutes. Cotswold holiday cottages are world class and are available to rent for a few days, or longer if you prefer. You can take the option of buying your very own luxury cottage in the area too, allowing you to have your own holiday hideaway whenever you need it. With excellent transport links, this holiday hideaway is ideal for people wishing to escape the hurly burly of everyday life, to spend time winding down in the tranquil Cotswold countryside and to enjoy everything this luxury resort has to offer.holiday cottages for sale in the Cotswolds in the Watermark resort are self-catering, so guests can cook their own culinary delights or choose to visit one of the restaurants located nearby. For sports oriented people the Cotswold Holiday cottages in the water park have many things to offer including tennis courts, badminton courts, table tennis courts, a swimming pool, gym and a number of different water sports. With so much going on for the visitors of the Cotswold water park, it is a comprehensive getaway where one can rent out a luxury cottage for a few days and indulge in everything that is on offer.
